QueryDefinition.Query: SELECT distinct prov_rendering_npi npi, 0 as GenderConceptId FROM {sc}.medical_claims where prov_rendering_npi is not null and prov_rendering_npi != '' and prov_rendering_npi != 'null' union SELECT distinct prov_dispensing_npi npi, 0 as GenderConceptId FROM {sc}.pharmacy_claims where prov_dispensing_npi is not null and prov_dispensing_npi != '' and prov_dispensing_npi != 'null' union SELECT distinct ordering_npi npi, 0 as GenderConceptId FROM {sc}.lab where ordering_npi is not null and ordering_npi != '' and ordering_npi != 'null'
